name: Automatic Quests
description: Never forget to claim a quest again!

issues.info: You can report issues on the mod's Github page!

quest-preview.name: Disable Quest Preview
quest-preview.description: Disables showing the preview for the next upcoming quest in the quest notification bar.

quest-diamonds.name: Disable Quest Diamonds
quest-diamonds.description: Disables the visual diamond collection in the "New Best" screen and "Level Complete" screen that show when you complete a quest.

quest-time.name: Notification Time
quest-time.description:
Controls how long the quest notification bar stays on screen, in seconds. This does not have an effect when the quest preview is disabled.

The default vanilla behavior is 3.2 seconds.
The default behavior for the mod is 4.0 seconds.
